body: Ideal Candidate:Are you fluent in Italian and you would like to start a career in one of the largest organizations in the world? We are looking for:- Excellent problem solving and analysis skills;- Self-Motivated, positive attitude and approach;- Flexibility to take on additional responsibility and tasks;- Accepts responsibility as an individual and works well within a team;- Fluency in Italian and English; - Bachelor degree in Social Sciences, Psychology, Foreign Languages.Job Description:We are currently hiring for one of our HR projects and our new colleagues will perform the following tasks:- Offer support services in HR for our clients (HR Administration support; Contact Center);- Interface with clients to help them in their HR needs: act as first point of contact for HR related questions via phone or E-Mail;- Develop improvements to processes and local work instructions;- Comply with all client and Accenture Data Security and Quality requirements.Benefits:- Work in a leading service providing company;- Develop knowledge of HR processes;- Learn the best practices in client relationship management;- Enjoy working in a global team environment.  Interviu Online:1.  Please rate your Italian skills, on a scale from 0 to 3 where 0= N/A; 1= Basic; 2= Conversational; 3= Fluent.
title: HR Generalist with Italian
locations: West Gate Park B-dul Preciziei nr. 24 - Sector 6 Bucuresti, București, Municipiul București, România
